text: @ANCA_DC @UN @StateDept @unfoundation @ArmeniaUN Starting from 12th of July, armed forces of Armenia attack to invade internationally recognized Azerbaijan territory which is outside of the occupied territories-Tovuz during the time when all the nations are busy with Covid-19 pandemic. #KarabakhisAzerbaijan #NKAZE
